location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Accountant General at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from John Kaye, Accountant General at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting payment for 'His Majesty's Mission to the Court of Persia' and enclosing the bill of lading for the stores embarked on board the Lovely Tish(receipt and bill are not enclosed).
